content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Reporter is a first manager in the hierarchy, who has attribute “Is Utilization Pool Manager” enabled, thus manager/head of unit is NOT necessarily a Reporter.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/3e6b2cc5-6106-4372-b6c6-b2c5f8004ddc/image2014-10-7%2014:30:12.png\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":385,\"height\":163}},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Reporter supervises employees from his/her Resource Pool, which may consist of other organizational Units and Subunits.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"List of reporters and resource pools (production, pre-production, non-production) can be found in UPSA: Summary → Workload by Resource Pool: Production, Pre-Production, Non-Production, Non-Employee.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Setting Manager as reporter should be coordinated with Director according to location.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
